name: @freesewing/plugin-bust
description: A freesewing plugin that helps with bust-adjusting menswear patterns
author: Joost De Cock <joost@decock.org> (https://github.com/joostdecock)

scripts.patch: npm version patch -m ':bookmark: v%s' && npm run build
scripts.minor: npm version minor -m ':bookmark: v%s' && npm run build
scripts.major: npm version major -m ':bookmark: v%s' && npm run build
scripts.coverage: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov > coverage.lcov && ./node_modules/.bin/codecov
scripts.rebuild: npm run nodebuild && npm run modulebuild
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run nodebuild && npm run modulebuild
